tree.original_reasoning:
We are given two programs to complete.

For program1.py:

                int t;
                cin >> t;
                while (t--) {
                    int n;
                    cin >> n;
                    vector<int> a(n);
                    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                        cin >> a[i];
                    }
                    int l = 0, r = n - 1;
                    int suml = 0, sumr = 0;
                    int ans = 0;
                    while (l <= r) {
                        if (suml == sumr) {
                            ans = l + (n - 1 - r);
                        }
                        if (suml <= sumr) {
                            suml += a[l];
                            l++;
                        } else {
                            sumr += a[r];
                            r--;
                        }
                    }
                    if (suml == sumr) {
                        ans = l + (n - 1 - r);
                    }
                    cout << ans << endl;
                }
            }
